titleStmt.title: That's How Love Starts, Ya Know!

cbml:balloon.p: LIKE I SAID, IF YA AIN'T GONNA LEND ME THE MONEY...

sp.speaker: BullyA
sp.p: ...IF YOU'RE REASONABLE AND PUT OUT INSTEAD, THAT'S COOL TOO.

sp.speaker: BullyA
sp.p: YER BROKE, AND YOU WON'T PUT OUT! LIKE I'D GIVE A SHIT ABOUT YOU!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: THAT'S NOT EVEN FUNNY! MORON! FISH BRAIN!

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: CALLING HIM SEAFOOD ISN'T BADMOUTHING HIM!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: YOU'RE SUPPOSED TO BE COMFORTING MEEE!

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: I TOLD YOU NOТ TO GET INVOLVED WITH THAT GUY

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: CAN YOU EVEN NAME ONE GOOD THING ABOUT HIM?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHAT'S WRONG WITH THAT?! I LIKE HARD-BOILED TOUGH GUYS LIKE KEN TAKAKURA!

sp.speaker: Celebrity Ken
sp.p: I AM AN AWKWARD FELLOW, AFTER ALL.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WILL I NEVER MEET ANOTHER KEN?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I MEAN, COME ON... SOMEBODY, ANYBODY, CONSOLE ME!

sp.speaker: Classmate
sp.p: QUIT LOOKING AT ME. YOU'RE CREEPING ME OUT.

sp.speaker: Classmate
sp.p: TRY ONE WITH A MAGNEТ IN IT.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: IS THE WORLD JUST FULL OF SCUMBAGS?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHAT CAN I DO TO UNLEASH THIS STRESS?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: HOW MANY TIMES ARE YOU GONNA REPEAT YOURSELF?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: FOR A PERSON LIKE YOU, MISS AYASE, TO COME TALK TO A FELLOw LIKE ME?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: THERE CAN BE ONLY ONE EXPLANATION!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I THINK YOU'VE GOT THЕ WRONG IDEA.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I'M NOТ TRYIN' TO BE YOUR FRIEND..

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: JUST FORGET WHAT HAPPENED BACK THERE.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: THIS IS WHAT I'M TALKING ABOUT!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: PRESIDENT ОВАМА HAS ALREADY BEEN TO MARS!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: THE WHOLE OF PROJECТ PEGASUS REVEALED!

stage.caption: RIGHTS NEGOTIATIONS FOR REPTILIANS MARS, AND THE EARTH!
WHAT IS THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE ILLUMINATI ANDTHE REPTILIANS?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: YOU'RE INTERESTED IN THE PARANORMAL, AREN'T YOU?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I DON'T BELIEVE IN UFOS OR ALIENS.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'M TALKING ABOUT UAPS, NOT UFOS!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: THE AMERICAN MILITARY HAS OFFICIALLY ACKNOWLEDGED THE EXISTENCE OF UAPS AND HAS BEEN REORGANIZED AS THE SPACE FORCE!

stage.caption: KOKU-JIEITAI *SPACE OPERATIONS SQUADRONS*

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: WHILE JAPAN HAS FOUNDED THE JAPAN AIR AND SPAСE SELF-DEFENSE FORCE!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: ANY WAY YOU LOOK AT IT, THEY'RE PREPARING FOR A SPACE WAR!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: THEY'VE GOT THЕ LATEST PICTURES OF NESSIE IN HERE!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: AND STUFF ABOUT LIEUTENANT COLONEL JIM CHANNON!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WOULD YOU SHUT THE HELL UP! I'M DEALING WITH A BROKEN HEART HERE!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I'M NOT IN THE MOOD FOR THIS NONSENSE! YOU'RE REALLY PUSHIN' IT WITH THAT NERD CRAP!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: THIS IS WHY YOU DON'T HAVE ANY FRIENDS!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: DON'T TALK TO ME LIKE WE'RE FRIENDS.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: NO WAY. THERE'S NO SUCH THING AS SPIRITS.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I WENT ALONG WITH YOUR NONSENSE, AND YOU HAVE THE NERVE TO JUST SHUT ME DOWN?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: PLEASE DO NOT BELITTLE THE PARANORMAL!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: LEMME TELL YA SOMETHIN'. MY GRANDMA'S A SPIRIT MEDIUM!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: HAVE YOU EVER SEEN AN EXORCISM?! IT'S SOО0 SCARY!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: THE POSSESSED PERSON HAS FITS AND STUFF!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: THAT'S NO PROOF THAT SPIRITS EXIST.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: OH, YEAН? WELL, HAVE YOU EVER HAD AN ALIEN OFFER YOU A RIDE IN ITS UFO?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: YOUR ARGUMENTS ARE ALL OVER THE PLACE!

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: SEEMS SHE'S GIVEN UP ON KEN TAKAKURA FOR THE GEEK TУРЕ.

sp.speaker: Miko
sp.p: I DON'T THINK SHE CARES HOW SHE LOOKS EITHER.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ALL RIGHT, TWERP. LET'S MAKE IT A CHALLENGE, THEN!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: IF I CAN PROVE SPIRITS ARE REAL...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ...THEN YOU HAVE TO SERVE AS MY GOFER!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: FINE. THEN I'LL SHOW YOU SOME UFOS!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: AND WHEN YOU FINALLY SEE ONE...

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: UM! THEN YOU'LL SERVE AS MY GOFER, MISS AYASE!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHAT IS THIS PLACE?! IT'S SCARING THE CRAP OUTTA ME!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: AND YOU'RE TELLING ME THIS IS A UFO HOTSPOТ?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: THEY SAY THE NAGI HOSPITAL IS PRACTICALLY THE HOLY LAND FOR UFOS!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: IF YOU CALL FOR A UFO FROM THE ROOF...

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: IT MEANS YOU GET KIDNAPPED BY ALIENS AND THEY USE YOU FOR HUMAN EXPERIMENTATION!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHOA! HOLD ON! HAVE YOU BEEN EXPERIMENTED ON?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABDUCTED HAVE THEIR MEMORIES WIPED.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: YOU'VE NEVER ACTUALLY SEEN A UFO, HAVE YOU?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: HAVE YOU HEARD OF REGRESSIVE HYPNOSIS?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: WHETHER I'VE SEEN ONE OR NOT IS INCONSEQUENTIAL!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: THE QUESTION IS WHETHER OR NOT THE ARGUMENT IS SOLID!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: HOW ARE THINGS GOING ON YOUR END?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: SHALL I PROVE TO YOU ONCE AND FOR ALL...

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: ...THAT THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS GHOSTS!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: HEY, YOU AREN'T ACTUALLY SCARED, ARE YOU?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: BY THE WAY, THEY SAY YOU ARE GUARANTEED TO SEE SOMETHING THERE. IT'S FAMOUS ON THE NET.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: THEY SAY A LOUD VOICE IS THE MOST DANGEROUS THING OF ALL.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: WAIT, WHY DO YOU KEEР SAYING "ON THE NET"?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: HAVE YOU SEEN A SPIRIT, MISS AYASE?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: YOU HAD SOME NERVE TALKING SO BIG BEFORE!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: TAKE BACK ALL THAT STUFF YOU SAID!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: YOU'VE NEVER EVEN SEEN A SPIRIT, BUT YOU STILL BELIEVE IN THEM-THAT'S JUST BIZARRE!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I TOLD YOU, MY GRANDMA'S A SPIRIT MEDIUM.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: AND WE WERE, LIKE, REAL CLOSE...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I NEED TO TELL YOU SOMETHING.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: MY FAMILY IS, LIKE, SUPER WEIRD.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHENEVER I USED TO GO OUTSIDE, I'D HAVE TO SWEAR TO DO A CERTAIN RITUAL FOR GOOD LUCK.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: MY GRANDMA MADE ME DO IT ALL THE WAY TO SCHOOL TOO.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: AND OF COURSE THE BOYS WOULD LAUGH AT ME.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: BUT IF I DIDN'T DO IT, MY GRANDMA WOULD GET ANGRY, AND THEN I'D FEEL PRETTY BAD ABOUT IT.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ...WAS WHEN THE BOY I LIKED MADE FUN OF ME.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I REALLY HATED MY GRANDMА FOR THAT.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: "BECAUSE OF THAT RITUAL, THE BOY I LIKE HATES ME NOW!" THAT'S WHAT I THOUGHT.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WE STOPPED TALKING FOR A LONG TIME.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: AND I STOPPED DOING THE RITUAL.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: BUT THE WEIRD THING IS, WHEN OTHER PEOPLE MAKE FUN OF MY FAMILY...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: IT WASN'T THAT THE BOY I LIKED DIDN'T LIKE ME.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHAT I REALLY HATED WAS THAT THE BOY I LIKED...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ... AND HER WORK AS A MEDIUM...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ...FELT SPECIAL TO ME, AND I LOVED THAT.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: SO NO, I'VE NEVER SEEN A GHOST.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: AND I DON'T KNOW IF MY GRANDMA'S ABILITY TO SENSE THE SUPERNATURAL IS THE REAL THING OR NOT.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: BUT SHE TOOK ME INTO HER CARE...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ... AND I WAS RAISED BY THE HANDS OF THAT ONE WOMAN.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: SO, LIKE, WHY DO YOU BELIEVE IN ALIENS?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: SERIOUSLY? YOU REALLY DON'T HAVE A REASON?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: DO YOU NEED TO HAVE A REASON TO LIKE SOMETHING?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I GUESS YOU'RE EASY TO TALK TO, MISS AYASE...

sp.speaker: Turbo Granny
sp.p: I'LL LET YOU SUCKLE MY TEATS...

sp.speaker: Turbo Granny
sp.p: ...F YOU LET ME GOBBLE YOUR SCHLONG.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: THE NET SAYS THAT'S SUPER DANGEROUS!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: MERELY A CHANCE ENCOUNTER WITH A HORNY OLD LADY!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: DO NOT LET HER OVERTAKE YOU, NO MATTER WHAT!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: IF YOU LOSE THE RACE AGAINST TURBO GRANNY...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: IF YOU COULD JUST, LIKE, STOP NOW...

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: WE ARE CALLED THAT BECAUSE WE COME FROM THE PLANET SERPO.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: YOUR THINGS ARE BEING HANDLED WITH CARE.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: THEY'RE TORN TО PIECES! YOU OWE ME COMPENSATION!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: COULD YOU LET ME OUTTA THIS THING?!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: THEREFORE, WE INCREASE OUR NUMBERS THROUGH CLONING TECHNOLOGY.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ARE YOU EVEN LISTENING TO ME?!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: HOWEVER, WHEN EVERY INDIVIDUAL IS IDENTICAL, EVOLUTION OF THE SPECIES DOES NOT OCCUR...

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: AS A RESULT, CONFLICT AND EMOTIONS SUCH AS JOY, ANGER, GRIEF, AND PLEASURE HAVE BEEN ERADICATED.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: AND SO, IN ORDER FOR US TO REACQUIRE REPRODUCTIVE FUNCTIONS...

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: ... WE WISH TO HAVE YOUR KIND'S BANANA ORGANS.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: WE WILL NOW PERFORM THE SEХ ACT.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: AFTER PERFORMING SEX WITH YOU, WE WILL EXTRACТ YOUR WOMB AND BANANA ORGANS FOR OUR RESEARCH.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: AS IF! SURE, I WAS DATING A REAL DIRTBAG...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ...BUT I STILL MANAGED TO WALK AWAY WITH MY VIRGINITY INTACT!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I'VE MAINTAINED MY CHASTITY FOR THE KEN TAKAKURA I'VE YET TO FIND...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ...AND I'LL BE DAMNED IF I LET SOME CREEPY-ASS ALIENS JUST TAKE IT FROM ME!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: IN ORDER TO AROUSE YOUR DESIRE, WE WILL CONTROL YOUR BRAIN WAVES WITH PSYCHOKINESIS.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: YOUR BODY IS GROWING WARMER AND WARMER, IS IT NOT?

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: A PERSON WITH BAD TIMING, IT WOULD SEEM...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: OCCULT-KUN! THANK GOD! PLEASE SAVE MЕ!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: USING A SMART PHONE TO INFILTRATE US...

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: ...IS A TECHNOLOGY THAT EVEN WE DO NOT HAVE.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: COME ON! GET А HOLD OF YOURSELF!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: YOU DO NOT HAVE PERMISSION TO ENTER THIS PLACE.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: I CANNOТ TRAIN MY PSYCHOKINESIS ON HIM!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: NEVER HAVE WE ENCOUNTERED SUCH A PHYSICALLY AGGRESSIVE PERSON.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: WE HAVE ESTABLISHED FRIENDLY RELATIONS WITH HUMANKIND...

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: ...SO PLEASE GIVE US YOUR BANANA ORGANS.

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: YOU CAN HAVE IT! IF IT'S MY OWN, YOU CAN HAVE WHATEVER YOU WANT!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: ALL MY LIFE I'VE WANTED TO MEEТ ALIENS!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: ...SO I THOUGHT IF THERE WERE ALIENS, MAYBE THEY WOULD BE FRIENDS WITH ME!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: EVER SINCE ELEMENTARY SCHOOL, I'VE LOOKED TO THE SKIES AND ASKED FOR UFOS TO COME!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: NO MATTER HOW MUCH I CALLED FOR THEМ, THEY NEVER APPEARED!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: HUMANS BULLIED ME JUST FOR KICKS...

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: NO ONE WOULD ACKNOWLEDGE MY EXISTENCE!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: SO DON'T YOU LAY A HAND ON HER!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: IF YOU HURT HER, YOU WON'T GET AWAY WITH IT!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: ...A MONSTER, IF IT'S FOR HER SAKE!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: SHOW THEM WHAT A MAN YOU ARE!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: I DON'T THINK I CAN DO IT AFTER ALL!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: AREN'T YOU GIVING UP A BIT TOO QUICKLY?!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: A BARBARIC PERSON SUCH AS YOURSELF...

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: WHAT'S MORE, WE PREFER WOMEN PERSONS...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ...MY FRIENDS MAKE FUN OF ME FOR IT.
WHAT ARE YOП TALKING ABOUT?! IF YOU RELEASE YOUR CHI...
...NO ILLNESS OR ACCIDENT WILL TROUBLE YOU!
NOTHING EVIL CAN COME NEAR YOU!
FIRST, FOCUS YOUR ENERGY BELOW YOUR BELLY...
...THEN VISUALIZE YOUR CHI BEAMING OUT OF THE CROWN OF YOUR HEAD.

sp.speaker: Kid
sp.p: HA HA! LOOK! SHE'S DOING IT AGAIN!

sp.speaker: Kid
sp.p: WHAT A WEIRDO! YOU TRYIN' TO COMMUNICATE WITH ALIENS OR SOMETHIN'?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I HATE IT! I'M NEVER DOING IT AGAIN!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHY AM I REMEМBERING THAT AT А TIME LIKE THIS?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I WAS JUST EMBARRASSED BACK THEN, THAT'S ALL...
FOCUS YOUR ENERGY BELOW YOUR BELLY...

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: MISS AYASE, YOU HAVE PARANORMAL ABILITIES?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I'M AS SHOCKED AS YOU ARE!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: WHAAAT?! MY PSYСНОKINESIS IS BEING PUSHED BACK!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: THIS PERSON WAS NOT ABLE TO EMPLOY PSYCHOKINESIS BEFORE!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: DID I OVERSTIMULATE HER BRAINWAVES WITH MY PSYCHOKINESIS...

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: ...CAUSING THE WOMAN PERSON'S CHAKRA TO OPEN UP?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ...CAUSING THE WOMAN PERSON'S CHAKRA TO OPEN UP?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: GRANDMА IS AN HONESTTO-GOODNESS REAL SPIRIT MEDIUM!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: THANK YOU, GRANDMА! NOW I CAN SEND THESE SCUMBAGS...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHAT THE HECK?! WERE WE IN A UFO?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: YOWCH! WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING, YOU MORON?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: GET A HOLD OF YOURSELF DAMN IT!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: EVEN THOUGH GRANNY HAS LEFT HIS BODY!

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: AS LONG AS I HAVE HIS SCHLONG...

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: ...THE CURSE ON THE YOUNGSTER WILL REMAIN.

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: IF YOU WANT IT BACK, THEN COME TO THE TUNNEL.

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: THIS PLACE IS TOO FAR AWAY FOR ME.

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: AT THE TUNNEL, I WILL TAKE ON AS MUCH AS YOU CARE TO GIVE!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHO'RE YOU CALLING A GARISH BITCH, YOU OLD HAG!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: OH NO! ANYWAY RIGHT NOW WE GOТТА GET OUTTA HERE OR WE'RE DEAD MEAT!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WELP I DEFINITELY BELIEVE IN ALIENS NOW.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I MEAN, I WAS ABDUCTED BY THEM.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: SO WHAT DО WE DO NOW?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: MISS AYASE, PLEASE PUT ON MY CLOTHES AND GO HOME.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: HANG ON! WITHOUT ME, YOU'LL GO BERSERK AGAIN!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: EVERYTHING THAT'S HAPPENED IS MY FAULT...

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I WON'T HAVE YOU BE INVOLVED IN IT ANY FURTHER.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'LL WORK UP THE COURAGE TO GO TO THE TUNNEL.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: AND AFTER THAT, I'LL SOLVE THIS. SOMEHOW.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: WHY AREN'T YOU ASKING ME TO COME WITH?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: AFTER WHAT I JUST EXPERIENCED, I CAN'T JUST WALK AWAY!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: BESIDES, IF I HADN'T BEEN THERE, YOU'D BE DEAD, YA KNOW!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: ISN'T IT BETTER IF WE WORK TOGETHER?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: ARE YOU SURE? I MEAN, EVEN IF YOU HELP ME...

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: GEEZ, WOULD YOU SHUT UP ABOUT IT?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: COME ON, PUT ON YOUR CLOTHES! WE'RE GOING!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: SO, PLEASE, MISS AYASE, PUT THESE ON.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: IF YOU DON'T, I WON'T BE ABLE TO SPEAK TO YOU PROPERLY.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I WAS JUST TAKEN ABACK WHEN HE HAPPENED TO SAY THAT KEN TAKAKURA LINE, THAT'S ALL.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: NOW THAT I THINK ABOUT IT, WHAT'S YOUR NAME AGAIN?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I'M REALLY BAD AT REMEMBERING NAMES!
